nodes.text: The Ghost of Jhonterius Park, who claimed to be the spirit of Jhonterius, was a mysterious, dark-robed figure who appeared in Jhonterius Park during the Galactic Civil War. He claimed to have come from beyond death to save the city of D'larah from its impending doom, which many believed referred to the impending supernova that would destroy the Demophon system. He refused extended communication with others, mostly frightening them away with wails. All attempts by the D'larah City Patrol to arrest him failed. A small cult formed around the figure, made of those who believed he was Jhonterius returned.
